Dancer

When another Pokémon uses a dance move, it immediately does so regardless of its Speed.

Affected Moves

The following moves are affected by this ability.

Name Type Category PP Power Accuracy Description
Aqua Step 10 80 100 The user attacks the target using fluid dance steps. This also boosts its Speed stat.
Clangorous Soul 5 — 100 The user raises all its stats by using some of its HP.
Dragon Dance 20 — — The user vigorously performs a mystic dance that raises its Attack and Speed stats.
Feather Dance 15 — 100 The user covers the target's body with a mass of down that harshly lowers its Attack stat.
Fiery Dance 10 80 100 Cloaked in flames, the user dances and flaps its wings. This may also raise its Sp. Atk stat.
Floral Flourish 20 70 100 A dancing whirl of flowers. Restores HP from the damage dealt in Floral Terrain.
Hypnotic Dance 5 — 100 The user performs an ancient dance that puts all Pokémon on the field to sleep.
Lunar Dance 10 — — The user faints, but whoever takes its place will have its HP restored and status cured.
Petal Dance 10 120 100 The user attacks by scattering petals for two to three turns and then becomes confused.
Quiver Dance 20 — — The user performs a beautiful dance, boosting its Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.
Revelation Dance 15 90 100 The user attacks the target by dancing very hard. This move's type depends on the user's.
Swords Dance 20 — — A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply raises the user's Attack stat.
Teeter Dance 20 — 100 The user performs a wobbly dance that confuses the Pokémon around it.
Victory Dance 10 0 — The user performs an intense dance to boost Attack, Defense, and Speed stats.

The following Pokémon can equip this ability after reaching a certain level.
